channel.title: I need a good base
channel.description: So I've just recently came back into the world of RSPS and all these new fancy revisions and PI servers and what not are around and i have no idea what in the fuck PI means....but beside that I'm trying to catch up with it all and find a good base source+client. I've been reading around and people suggest certain ones(forgot the names) and I've downloaded a few and it all looks really odd to me. Delta is extremely simple to me, but everyone thinks it's shit so.....I need a new base! What are your guys favorite bases or what do you recommend for me to start a huge project on. i was going for an economy server taking some ideas from Dodian(my favorite server of all time) but i couldn't get it right so i gave up. Thanks in advance , if you actually read this lol

item.title: I need a good base
item.dc:creator: @UndeadDino UndeadDino
item.description:
@UndeadDino wrote:

that was one of my problems, haha, i didn’t know where xp rate was so I could just it to 4, like normal rs is set to.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a good base
item.dc:creator: @777slots2 777slots2
item.description:
@777slots2 wrote:

I downloaded it, it was very clean yes, but it would be an extreme pain in my ass to remove everything and completely change everything he ha already done haha. Im going for a slow xp rate good economy server

Read full topic

item.title: I need a good base
item.dc:creator: @UndeadDino UndeadDino
item.description:
@UndeadDino wrote:

yeah, it is actually a lot nicer, there are hardly any customs in it, 99% of them are in a folder, you just have to put them in. It is super easy. You can always move things.
